sentences.english: So God subdued on that day Jabin the king of Canaan before the children of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，神使迦南王耶賓被以色列人制伏了。

sentences.english: And they took their cattle, and their goods, which they had gotten in the land of Canaan, and came into Egypt, Jacob, and all his seed with him
sentences.chinese: 他們又帶着迦南地所得的牲畜，貨財來到埃及。

sentences.english: Johnson built the 47-acre estate for himself in New Canaan, Connecticut.
sentences.chinese: 住宅位於康涅狄格新迦南一塊佔地47英畝的地塊上。

sentences.english: And they said, From the land of Canaan to buy food.
sentences.chinese: 他們說，我們從迦南地來糴糧。

sentences.english: Abraham ordered to southern Canaan with an elite corps of cavalrymen.
sentences.chinese: 亞伯拉罕命令迦南南部集結一支精英的騎兵軍隊。

sentences.english: The Canaanite king of Arad, who lived in the Negev of Canaan, heard that the Israelites were coming.
sentences.chinese: 住在迦南南地的迦南人亞拉得王，聽說以色列人來了。

sentences.english: The Canaanite king of Arad, who lived in the Negev of Canaan, heard that the Israelites were coming.
sentences.chinese: 住在迦南南地的迦南人亞拉得王，聽說以色列人來了。

sentences.english: To be blunt, El the patriarchs seem to have worshiped the Canaanite God, El.
sentences.chinese: 大膽地說，族長們似乎曾經崇拜迦南的上帝。

sentences.english: He said, "Don't get a wife for my son from the Canaanite girls.
sentences.chinese: 他說，“不要爲我兒子娶這迦南地中的女子爲妻。

sentences.english: This would have been the practice of the false worship of the Canaanite gods.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的行爲是因爲他們崇拜迦南人的假神造成的。

sentences.english: They ate the corn and other food that had been harvested in the land of Canaan.
sentences.chinese: 但在吉甲開始，他們便可以喫迦南地所出的一切土產。

sentences.english: These were grandsons of Esau's wife Adah.
sentences.chinese: 這都是以掃的兒子，是在迦南地生的。

sentences.english: He is a musician and church building committee member of Canaan Baptist Church.
sentences.chinese: 他是迦南浸信會的樂手及建堂委員會成員。

sentences.english: Yet Israel did not burn any of the cities built on their mounds-except Hazor, which Joshua burned.
sentences.chinese: 在進軍迦南的戰役中，以色列人爲甚麼將夏瑣焚燒？

sentences.english: Canaan was certainly better than the wilderness.
HEROD: But I have heard it said that Iokanaan is in very truth your prophet Elias.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說伊奧迦南的的確確就是你們的先知伊利亞。

definition: Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
